services.name: Credit Risk Assessment Service
services.description: This API allows financial institutions to assess the creditworthiness of potential borrowers using comprehensive data analysis and predictive models.

services.name: Real-Time Market Data Service
services.description: Provides up-to-the-second financial market data, including stock prices, indices, and trading volumes, for informed financial decision-making.

services.name: Insurance Claim Processing Service
services.description: Enables automated processing, validation, and tracking of insurance claims to expedite resolution and enhance customer satisfaction.

services.name: Mortgage Eligibility Analyzer
services.description: Helps users determine eligibility for mortgage loans by analyzing financial data, credit scores, and current rates.

services.name: Banking Transaction Security Enhancer
services.description: Implements robust transaction monitoring and anomaly detection to secure banking operations against fraud.
